snippet: Frustration erupted Tuesday in a landmark priest-abuse case as jurors failed to reach a verdict for a seventh day and a defense lawyer raged over their demands.
abstract: Jurors in Philadelphia fail to reach a verdict for a seventh day in the landmark sexual-abuse trial of Rev James J Brennan and Msgr William J Lynn.
lead_paragraph: Frustration erupted Tuesday in a landmark priest-abuse case as jurors failed to reach a verdict for a seventh day and a defense lawyer raged over their demands.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Tension Flares in Priest Abuse Trial
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Tension Flares In Priest Abuse Trial
